source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  [CountryCode]
      ,[CountryName]
      ,[ZoneCode]
      ,[ZoneDescription]
      ,[RegionCode]
      ,[RegionDescription]
      ,[SubRegionCode]
      ,[SubRegionDescription]
      ,[TerritoryCode]
      ,[TerritoryDescription]
  FROM [FMCG-DW].[dbo].[stgGeographyClassfication]
  where TerritoryCode is NOT NULL

Select Distinct PC.Brand,PC.BrandDescription, PC.ProductCategory,PC.ProductCategoryDescription, PC.PRODTYPE, PC.PRODTYPEDescription From
(select [ProductCode],
MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Brand' Then MasterGroupValue End) As Brand,
MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Brand' Then MasterGroupValueDescription End) As BrandDescription,
MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Product Category' Then MasterGroupValue End) As ProductCategory,
MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Product Category' Then MasterGroupValueDescription End) As ProductCategoryDescription,
MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Brand Product Code' Then MasterGroupValue End) As PRODTYPE,
MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Brand Product Code' Then MasterGroupValueDescription End) As PRODTYPEDescription
from [FMCG-DW].[dbo].[stgProductClassification]
group by ProductCode) PC
where PC.PRODTYPE <> 'ALL'

Select Distinct PC.ProductCategory, PC.ProductCategoryDescription, PC.Brand, PC.BrandDescription, PC.ProductGroup, PC.ProductGroupDescription From
(select [ProductCode],
	MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Product Category' Then MasterGroupValue End) As ProductCategory,
	MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Product Category' Then MasterGroupValueDescription End) As ProductCategoryDescription,
	MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Brand' Then MasterGroupValue End) As Brand,
	MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Brand' Then MasterGroupValueDescription End) As BrandDescription,
	MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Product Code' Then MasterGroupValue End) As ProductGroup,
	MAX(Case When MasterGroupDescription = 'Product Code' Then MasterGroupValueDescription End) As ProductGroupDescription
from [FMCG-DW].[dbo].[stgProductClassification]
group by ProductCode) PC
